items.sentence: It\'s not too late to tell Tom that you love him.
Tom told Mary that he thought John would be late.
Tom told Mary to leave the key under the doormat.
Tom told me I could keep the book if I wanted it.
I\'ll be happy to help you look for an apartment.
I\'ll be paying that off for the rest of my life.
I\'ll bet you three hundred dollars Tom will win.
I\'ll make sure Tom does what we asked him to do.
A long time ago, people had very short lifespans.
Tom stays inside all day staring at the computer.
